comment:
Extracted Variables:
- \( x \): number of truck trips
- \( y \): number of car trips

Definitions:
- \( x \): represents the number of truck trips made by the shipping company
- \( y \): represents the number of car trips made by the shipping company

Extracted Constraints:
- Packages: \( 50x + 30y \geq 500 \) (At least 500 packages need to be transported)
- Gas: \( 20x + 15y = \text{Total gas consumed} \) (Total gas consumed by the company)
- Truck Trips: \( x \leq 5 \) (At most 5 truck trips can be made)
- Car Trips: \( y \geq 0.3(x+y) \) (At least 30% of all trips must be made by car)

Objective:
- Minimize Total gas consumed: \( 20x + 15y \) (Minimize the total amount of gas consumed by the company)
